songs.lyrics:
[Hook: R.A. The Rugged Man]
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!

[Verse 1: R.A. The Rugged Man]
Check this, I wreck shit, I rip shit, no
Bring that shit back, rewind it (ihateeverybodyihateverybodyihateeverybody..)
You can't kick it what I'm talking bout
BLAOW! Shout it out
Now your faggot ass is walking out
1 to head from the white bred and ya dead bled
Dripping bleak blood red, from the bloodshed
Western bitches with my big testes I molest them
Shitty rappers I dissect 'em, swallow 'em and the digest 'em
Iiii don't give a motherfuck about you
The whack rap I can't live without you
I don't need it if I meet a stank pussy
I meet greet it, I might eat it I ain't never been defeated
Nobody knows
That I got the ill flows, shit blows when my dick grows
I'm doing tours I'm down with whores not jabber jaws
(I got a man) Oh yeah word, shut the fuck up and drop your drawers!
Bloodshed hua, say goodbye to oo-eh, ooh eh
Straight ooh eh

[Hook: R.A. The Rugged Man]
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!

[Verse 2: R.A. The Rugged Man]
Beastie neck fool down in Carolina
I won't going "downtown"
Unless there's gold in her vagina
They have opinions, the southern counties
Act like [?] I take out three of them, I hate to be 'em
With the hua-haa, bloodshed hua hoo
Wit da new-eh, style for your crew-eh
And I could just make it get to ya baby, blauuhh
(Yo kick that real shit!) Now what was it?
Got disgusted, now bust it, ya microphone is rusted
I buh-buh-buh-ba-bum rushed it
It's ALRIGHT, I'll make ya feel it
Hopsy topsy, I'm lethal like a nazi you can't stop me
Who da fuck ya think ya are?
Bla bla bla (R.A. The Rugged) a superstar!
I don't need no nonsense, the constantly be jumping
From my John-son (YES!) I be there where ya at punk
Ya better watch ya back cos I never fight fair
So bring some hookers and I might have some do rahh
Bloodshed hua haaa!

[Hook: R.A. The Rugged Man]
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!

[Verse 3: R.A. The Rugged Man]
(coming soon..)

[Hook: R.A. The Rugged Man]
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!
Bloodshed hua hoo, hua hoo!

[Outro: R.A. The Rugged Man]
Hua, hua, hoo, bloodshed!
songs.title: Bloodshed Hua Hoo (Sunny Balls Mix)
